body:
Comment 6: 
Yes: it is the value of c that is never used here.
Do you have any suggestions about how to reword the message?

declared and not read

would be more accurate but I think more confusing
(and wouldn't have avoided the confusion you had).

I think the real issue here was that you thought there
were reference variables in Go.  I'm not sure any
wording of the message could have helped here.
_Owner changed to **r...@golang.org**._ _Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
